metadata.title: CVE-2022-46908 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description: SQLite through 3.40.0, when relying on --safe for execution of an untrusted CLI script, does not properly implement the azProhibitedFunctions protection mechanism, and instead allows UDF functions such as WRITEFILE.

notes.note: mdeslaur> per upstream, this isn't an important issue as it only affects the debugging CLI, marking as low priority

criterions.comment: sqlite3 package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
